content.description: Sit start with a left hand jug sidepull. From there, pull up through a series of crimps and rails to reach a solid topout.
content.protection: A pad should suffice, the landing is great.
content.location: This ascends the east face of Striped Rock.

content.description: Start with some awkward holds at chest height, move straight up the featured face to the better defined set of crimps and a solid topout.
content.location: It is on the east face of Striped Rock.

content.description: Sit start straddling the arete with your legs, a left hand pinch, and a low right gaston. From there, make a big move to a right hand edge, gain the fin, then the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the boulder's northwest arete.

content.protection: Pads. There's a good landing though.
content.location:
The route is located on left side of the north face. It could be seen as a little contrived, but if you move out right as you move up, it's a lot different (and not nearly as awkward) as

Burnt Orange

.

content.description: Start by stepping onto good footing, then follow the edges on the slab to mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is great.
content.location: It climbs the boulder's southwest slab.

content.description: Sit start with a pair of excellent edges. From there, make a big move to a big edge, gain the lip, and mantel on the boulder.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is great.
content.location: This climbs the boulder's west face.

content.description: Climb up the northeast arete on the right side. There are good holds with a good topout.
content.location: The downclimb is on the southeast side of the boulder.

content.description: Stand start with a left hand crimp, and a right hand sidepull. From there, work straight up the vertical face on solid crimps and rails to reach the topout.
content.protection: A pad or two, but the landing is perfect.
content.location: It ascends the east face of Striped Rock.
